Format raw w_* results into standardized output structure

Source: R/w_factory.R
dot-w_format_results.Rd

Handles multi-variable (long format) vs single-variable, and grouped vs ungrouped results.

Usage

.w_format_results(
  results,
  var_names,
  weights_name,
  is_grouped,
  weighted_col,
  unweighted_col,
  is_grouped_flag
)

Arguments

results

Raw tibble from computation

var_names

Character vector of variable names

weights_name

Weight variable name or NULL

is_grouped

Logical

weighted_col

Name for weighted statistic column

unweighted_col

Name for unweighted statistic column

is_grouped_flag

Same as is_grouped (kept for clarity)

Value

Formatted tibble
